Title: Training Day
Overview: On his first day on the job as a narcotics officer, a rookie cop works with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears.
Tagline: The only thing more dangerous than the line being crossed, is the cop who will cross it.
Keywords: police brutality, war on drugs, drug traffic, drug dealer, los angeles, gang member, mexican american, barrio, cholo
production_companies: Village Roadshow Pictures, NPV Entertainment, Warner Bros., Outlaw Productions (I), WV Films II
Cast: Denzel Washington, Ethan Hawke, Scott Glenn
